meanings.definition: A type of stick used in the Irish sport of hurling.
meanings.sent1: The players on the field wield hurleys skillfully during the game.
meanings.sent2: The coach handed out new hurleys to the team before the match.
meanings.sent3: The hurleys in the equipment room seemed to have a secret meeting at night.
meanings.sent4: His words were sharp as hurleys, striking deep into her heart.
meanings.sent5: The colorful hurleys gleamed under the bright stadium lights.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'hurley', referring to multiple sticks used in hurling.
meanings.sent1: The team carried their hurleys onto the field with determination.

meanings.sent3: The hurleys lined up neatly, ready for action like soldiers in a row.
